title: Task Distribution and Coordination System
body_html:
Task Distribution and Coordination System

Task Management Framework

1. Task Classification

  • Priority Levels

    • Critical: Immediate attention required
    • High: Time-sensitive tasks
    • Normal: Standard operations
    • Low: Background tasks

  • Task Types

    • User Interactions
    • System Operations
    • Research Tasks
    • Maintenance Operations

2. Distribution Algorithm

def distribute_task(task):
    # Analyze task requirements
    requirements = analyze_task(task)
    
    # Find suitable agents
    available_agents = get_available_agents(requirements)
    
    # Calculate agent scores
    agent_scores = score_agents(available_agents, requirements)
    
    # Assign task
    selected_agent = select_best_agent(agent_scores)
    assign_to_agent(task, selected_agent)
